Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.

Because Chrys ler still owes about$ 5.8 billion to the U.S. government, lent under the Troubled Asset Relief Program, the U.S. Treasury can restrict senior management's compensation. It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly, CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call.`` The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom-line profitability.''
